name: Key Account Manager (Mobile Division)
description:
Responsibilities:
  • Сategory development in own accounts (Federals)
  • Planning and implementation of promo activities
  • New product launching
  • Sales planning: sell-in/out in quarterly/monthly/weekly horizons
  • Weekly sales execution
  • Company's sales and brand strategy implementation
Requirements:
  • KAM experience at Mobile/ IT market not less than 5 years
  • English Upper-intermediate level
  • Extensive knowledge of electronic B2C market
  • Ability to manage big assortment (> 300 SKU)
  • Ability to multi-task and prioritize in a fast-paced environment
  • Team player
  • Advanced Excel user

professional_roles.name: Менеджер по продажам, менеджер по работе с клиентами
